hadiths.arabic: إِنَّمَا الأَعْمَالُ بِالنِّيَّاتِ وَإِنَّمَا لِكُلِّ امْرِئٍ مَا نَوَى
hadiths.text: The rewards of deeds depend upon the intentions and every person will get the reward according to what he has intended.

Islam has been built upon five things - on testifying that there is no god save Allah, and that Muhammad is His Messenger; on performing salah; on giving the zakah; on Hajj to the House; and on fasting during Ramadan.

hadiths.arabic: مَنْ أَحْدَثَ فِي أَمْرِنَا هَذَا مَا لَيْسَ مِنْهُ فَهُوَ رَدٌّ
hadiths.text: He who innovates something in this matter of ours that is not of it will have it rejected.

hadiths.arabic: طَلَبُ الْعِلْمِ فَرِيضَةٌ عَلَى كُلِّ مُسْلِمٍ
hadiths.text: Seeking knowledge is an obligation upon every Muslim.

hadiths.arabic: مَنْ سَلَكَ طَرِيقًا يَلْتَمِسُ فِيهِ عِلْمًا سَهَّلَ اللَّهُ لَهُ طَرِيقًا إِلَى الْجَنَّةِ
hadiths.text: Whoever follows a path in pursuit of knowledge, Allah makes his path to Paradise easy.

hadiths.arabic: الصَّلَوَاتُ الْخَمْسُ وَالْجُمْعَةُ إِلَى الْجُمْعَةِ كَفَّارَةٌ لِمَا بَيْنَهُنَّ
hadiths.text: The five prayers and the Friday prayer to the next Friday prayer are expiations for what is between them.
